item.description:
**Test Scenario 2** : Verify that partner should not be able to register themselves by providing any 2 required information from either Name or Email or Mobile number

Note : Email and Mobile number should be unique

The most probable combination for these 3 fields should be

1. name-mobile
2. name-email
3. mobile-name
4. mobile-email
5. email-name
6. email-mobile

item.name: TS 3 : Verify that partner should be able to register or not
TC-1 : Verify that if partner provides only requiredInfo

exec: pm.test("Verify that the status code of the request is 200", function () {
pm.test("Verify that the response time is less than 500ms", function () {
pm.test("Verify that the POST request should be successful", function () {
pm.test("Verify that the content-Type 'application/json' should be set in the headers", function () {
pm.test("Verify that requiredInfo property is true", function () {
pm.test("Verify that alreadyExist property is false", function () {
// pm.test("Verify that distributer object has all the required properties", function () {
pm.test("Verify that address property is false", function () {
pm.test("Verify that bankDetails property is false", function () {
pm.test("Verify that aadharDetails property is false", function () {
pm.test("Verify that panDetails property is false", function () {
pm.test("Verify that Distributor relation property is false", function () {
